channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A doctor answers your questions about the COVID-19 vaccine
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers talks with infectious disease expert Dr. Peter Chin-Hong about the new rules regarding access to COVID-19 vaccines.

item.title: An ancient disease makes yet another comeback
item.description: Why cholera is striking in Africa. It's a disease that's easy to control with proper treatment. But without medical care, patients can perish quickly.
